AT.name: 3D Sonic The Hedgehog 2
AT.description: Sonic ist zu neuen Heldentaten angetreten, dieses Mal unterstützt von seinem Freund Tails! Dr. Eggman (auch bekannt als Dr. Robotnik) ist wieder aufgetaucht und baut an seiner ultimativen Waffe: dem Death Egg. Dazu verwandelt er die tierischen Anwohner von Mobius in seine persönliche Badnik-Armee. Kann Sonic die 7 Chaos Emeralds finden und ihn endgültig aufhalten? 3D Sonic The Hedgehog 2 ist neu in 3D aufgearbeitet und kommt mit neuen Funktionen! Dein Lieblingslevel ist die Chemical Plant-Zone? Über “Stage Select” gelangst du zu jedem beliebigen Ort! Lauf wie der Wind und sorge dich nicht um deine Ringe: Im “Ring Keeper”-Modus verlierst du nur die Hälfte deiner Ringe, wenn du Schaden nimmst!

AU.name: 3D Sonic The Hedgehog 2
AU.description: Sonic is here to save the day, and this time he’s got help from his friend Tails! Dr. Eggman (AKA Dr. Robotnik) is back and is planning on building his ultimate weapon, the Death Egg. To do so, he’s going to turn the animal inhabitants of Mobius into his own personal army of Badniks. Can Sonic obtain the 7 Chaos Emeralds and stop him once and for all? 3D Sonic The Hedgehog 2 is remastered in 3D and full of new features! Is the Chemical Plant Zone your favorite stage? Use “Stage Select” and start running wherever you want! Run fast without worrying about your rings. Cut your losses by choosing Ring Keeper Mode—only half your rings will be lost after taking damage! Keeping your rings and stopping Dr. Eggman’s evil scheme is important, but don’t forget to take some time off from saving the world to play against your friends in the 2 Player VS and CO-OP Mode using Local Play!

BG.name: 3D Sonic The Hedgehog 2

Use “Stage Select” and start running wherever you want! Run fast without worrying about your rings. Cut your losses by choosing Ring Keeper Mode—only half your rings will be lost after taking damage! Keeping your rings and stopping Dr. Eggman’s evil scheme is important, but don’t forget to take some time off from saving the world to play against your friends in the 2 Player VS and CO-OP Mode using Local Play!

BE.name: 3D Sonic The Hedgehog 2
BE.description: Sonic arrive à la rescousse, et cette fois-ci, son ami Tails est là pour l’aider ! Dr. Eggman (alias Dr. Robotnik) est de retour, et a pour objectif de construire son arme ultime, le Death Egg. Pour cela, il va transformer les habitants de Mobius en son armée personnelle de Badniks. Sonic peut-il obtenir les 7 Chaos Emeralds pour l’arrêter une bonne fois pour toutes ? Sonic The Hedgehog 2 3D est remasterisé pour la 3D et comporte de toutes nouvelles fonctions ! La Zone Chemical Plant est ton étape préférée ? Utilise « Stage Select » et commence à courir là où tu veux ! Cours vite sans te préoccuper de tes Rings. Limite tes pertes avec le mode Ring Keeper : tu n’en perdras que la moitié après avoir subi des dégâts ! Garder tes Rings et arrêter les plans diaboliques de Dr. Eggman est essentiel, mais n’oublie pas de te reposer dans ta mission en jouant contre tes amis dans les modes 2 PLAYER VS et CO-OP, avec le mode multijoueur local Nintendo 3DS™ !

ES.name: 3D Sonic The Hedgehog 2
ES.description: ¡Sonic ha llegado para salvar el mundo y cuenta con la ayuda de su amigo Tails! El Dr. Eggman (alias Dr. Robotnik) ha vuelto y planea construir su arma definitiva, el Death Egg. Para ello, piensa convertir a los animales de Mobius en su ejército personal de Badniks. ¿Podrá Sonic conseguir las 7 Chaos Emeralds y detenerle de una vez por todas? ¡Ahora 3D Sonic The Hedgehog 2 está remasterizado en 3D y viene con muchísimas funciones nuevas! ¿Es la Zona Chemical Plant tu fase preferida? ¡Usa “Stage Select” y empieza a correr donde más te apetezca! Corre tan rápido como quieras sin preocuparte por tus Rings. Elige el “Ring Keeper Mode” y solo perderás la mitad de Rings si recibes daños. Conservar tus Rings y frustrar el maléfico plan del Dr. Eggman es vital, ¡pero no te olvides de tomarte un descanso mientras salvas el mundo para jugar contra tus amigos en los modos 2 Player VS y CO-OP con el modo de juego local de Nintendo 3DS™!

IT.name: 3D Sonic The Hedgehog 2
IT.description: Sonic è pronto a salvare il mondo, e stavolta ha portato anche il suo amico Tails! Il Dr. Eggman è tornato e sta progettando la creazione di un’arma suprema, il Death Egg. Per farlo, dovrà trasformare in badnik gli animali che abitano Mobius, così da formare un esercito. Riuscirà Sonic a ottenere i 7 Chaos Emerald e fermarlo? Sonic The Hedgehog 2 3D è rimasterizzato ed è pieno di nuove funzionalità! La Zona Chemical Plant è la tua fase preferita? Usa “Seleziona fase” e inizia a correre! Sfreccia velocemente senza preoccuparti dei Ring. Scegli la modalità Ring Keeper per perdere solo metà dei Ring dopo aver subito dei danni! Accumulare Ring e fermare il piano malefico del Dr. Eggman è importante, ma non dimenticare di prenderti una pausa dalla tua missione e giocare contro i tuoi amici con le modalità 2 PLAYER VS e CO-OP, grazie alla modalità wireless Nintendo 3DS™!

SK.description: Sonic is here to save the day, and this time he’s got help from his friend Tails! Dr. Eggman (AKA Dr. Robotnik) is back and is planning on building his ultimate weapon, the Death Egg. To do so, he’s going to turn the animal inhabitants of Mobius into his own personal army of Badniks. Can Sonic obtain the 7 Chaos Emeralds and stop him once and for all? 3D Sonic The Hedgehog 2 is remastered in 3D and full of new features! Is the Chemical Plant Zone your favorite stage? Use “Stage Select” and start running wherever you want! Run fast without worrying about your rings. Cut your losses by choosing Ring Keeper Mode—only half your rings will be lost after taking damage! Keeping your rings and stopping Dr. Eggman’s evil scheme is important, but don’t forget to take some time off from saving the world to play against your friends in the 2 Player VS and CO-OP Mode using Local Play!
